name: Morine
greetingText: I have a little secret I would like to tell you!
text1: I have kept it since the day I saw you
textInChatBox: I should have said this like two years ago!
text2: But I have not yet said it.
text4: Because of keeping it for so long! I want to say it in a.
wishText: PS: I loved you the first day I saw you. But you were still young, I would not have told you that.
wishHeading: I have a crush on you.
outroText: Love you and I wish you would be my little princess.
replayText: Tap here to watch that again.
